ing: 8 ounces extra sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
8 ounces processed cheese food (such as VelveetaÂ®), cubed
1/2 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®)
1 red chile pepper, seeded and chopped
des: "This recipe has just the right amount of spice, and just the right amount of creamy."
ins: Place the Cheddar cheese, processed cheese, mayonnaise, pepper sauce, onion, Worcestershire sauce, pimentos, pecans, and red chile pepper in a food processor. Blend until smooth. Chill overnight for flavors to blend.
